title: Katarina Slays Montage

embed.description: A collection of cool Katarina Kills to the music of Gorowski - I believe me now, and Decktronic - Unbox me (feat kitty) Cosplay Picture is MelodyxNya@deviantart.com

body:
Hey everyone, I'm back with another youtube video for you to checkout if you feel like it. Its me killing people with Katarina.

Enjoy, and thanks for checking it out =)

SentienceLOL,
[http://www.youtube.com/SentienceLOL]

replies.body:
I think Kat is in a stable place, she is easily countered. I say she is stable but that is to justify myself one tricking her.

Sexy plays and sexy music, I'm going to have to use the music for one of my videos if you don't mind! Will sub fam
Of course feel free to use the music, its royalty free, you'll find of ton of stuff at [http://freemusicarchive.org] . Cheers for checking out the vid =)

'we feel katarina is in a stable place right now' -Rito 2k17...
{{champion:48}}

She's difficult because of the low life level (like LeBlanc) and being melee, but rewarding, easy to counter pick, and a bit reliant on tanks to distract players to create opportunities. But when it all clicks together she can hard carry a match.
I was trying to say that if the stars align and she has a good team, she is stupidly op xD
